headline: Pipedrive Appoints Regi Vengalil as CFO to Drive Next Stage of AI-Native Growth
summary: NEW YORK, December 02, 2025--Pipedrive, the easy and effective sales CRM for small companies, today announced the appointment of Regi Vengalil as the company’s new Chief Financial Officer. Vengalil brings nearly two decades of financial and strategic leadership experience from high-growth SaaS, fintech, and AI-driven companies, guiding companies through complex market landscapes and driving clarity and discipline in financial operations.

headline: Expedia Group (EXPE): Assessing Valuation Following Recent Share Price Surge
summary: Expedia Group (EXPE) shares moved higher today, with investors watching the company after it posted solid gains over the past month. Market participants continue to evaluate its performance and outlook in a competitive online travel landscape. See our latest analysis for Expedia Group. Expedia Group’s momentum has been hard to miss, with a 17.7% jump in its share price over the past month and a year-to-date share price return of nearly 40%.
